markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Aquadynamic](/Traits.aspx?ID=792)</title>

**Source** [Howl of the Wild](/Sources.aspx?ID=226) pg. 216 <sup>2.1</sup>

This armor is made for use underwater, with streamlined design and buoyant materials used in strategic places. You don’t apply the armor’s [check penalty](/Rules.aspx?ID=2173) to [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34) or [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) checks in water or similar liquids.
name: Aquadynamic
